scenarios.description:
5aaaa
Literally just dial A, does decent damage
scenarios.name: 5AAA

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b d236b
No limit without leveling d236, but its a hard
kd anyways won't knock down at further spacings
scenarios.name: 5AA starter

scenarios.description:
5aa a623b hj9 j5a j6a j6b
Works point blank only
scenarios.name: Midscreen starter fire oni

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b a623c hj9 j5a j6a j2b/j6b
Slight variation of the other starter, can be
used to >limit if too far from the
other corner
scenarios.name: Midscreen starter fire oni 2

scenarios.description:
66a d214b/a623b hj9 j5a j6a
Highest damage options off of a 66a hit,
many other skills work here
note: d214 is slightly rng dependant
scenarios.name: 66a confirm

scenarios.description:
CH 6a 5b(whiff) hj9 j5a j6a j6b
CH 6a gives a lot of time to follow up
and can lead to a lot of damage
5b can be used to cancel the lag of moves,
even if it doesn't connect
scenarios.name: CH 6a

scenarios.description:
CH2b/2[b] 2c hj8/hj9 j5a j6a
2b is a good tool to frametrap in your
blockstrings. On CH, it allows for heavy
damage. 2[b] can be comboed in a similar way
even without CH
scenarios.name: CH 2b/2[b]

scenarios.description:
j2a j5b j66 j2a j2b/j5b
Standard j2a combo, can use j5a j6a if
opponent is close to the corner after j5b
scenarios.name: j2a starter

scenarios.description:
j8a j5[b] j66 j5a j6a j6b
Air confirm using j8a, may be finicky with
spacing opponent should be level with or
slightly below Suika during j5[b]
scenarios.name: Air-to-Air j8a

scenarios.description:
j5a j6a j6b a236b/c
Simple air-to-air limit midscreen with oni
spirit bomb
scenarios.name: Midscreen Air-to-Air

scenarios.description:
j5a j6a j6c a236/j44 j6b
Connecting with j6c after j6a is rather
spacing specific but grants excellent
damage if done properly.
scenarios.name: Midscreen Air-to-Air (close)

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b a623b hj9 j5a j6a j6b
Strong, easy corner combo if fire oni
is leveled
scenarios.name: Corner 5AA starter

scenarios.description:
4a 5b hj9 j5a j6b j5b d623b/a236b/c
Basic combo off of aub 4a in corner,
oni spirit bomb can also be used to limit
scenarios.name: Corner AUB starter

scenarios.description:
5aa 2b d214c hj9 j6a
A strong midscreen combo option
available in monsoon
scenarios.name: Monsoon Midscreen

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5aaaa
A simple combo that does massive damage in
monsoon needs a delay after 5aaa
scenarios.name: Monsoon Corner

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b chain 5aaaa
Simple, high damage confirm with 2sc chain;
A slight walk forward is needed after the
chain
scenarios.name: Basic chain confirm

scenarios.description:
5aa 5b chain 5aa chain 5aa 5b
If two chain cards are held they can both be
used in the same combo for less damage, but
more orbs crushed
scenarios.name: Basic chain confirm cont.
